metadata.title: USN-5858-1 -- Linux kernel (OEM) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Davide Ornaghi discovered that the netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly handle VLAN headers in some situations. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2023-0179)  It was discovered that the Netronome Ethernet driver in the Linux kernel contained a use-after-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-3545)  Tam√°s Koczka discovered that the Bluetooth L2CAP implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly initialize memory in some situations. A physically proximate attacker could possibly use this to expose sensitive information (kernel memory). (CVE-2022-42895)  It was discovered that an integer overflow vulnerability existed in the Bluetooth subsystem in the Linux kernel. A physically proximate attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash). (CVE-2022-45934)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5858-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-image-unsigned-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-oem-5.17-tools-host - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-modules-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-modules-ivsc-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-image-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-oem-5.17-headers-5.17.0-1027 - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-oem-5.17-tools-5.17.0-1027 - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-headers-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-modules-ipu6-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-modules-iwlwifi-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-buildinfo-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 linux-tools-5.17.0-1027-oem - 5.17.0-1027.28 No subscription required  linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-headers-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-image-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-modules-iwlwifi-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-modules-ivsc-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-image-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-tools-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-tools-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-headers-oem-22.04 - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-modules-ipu6-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 linux-oem-22.04a - 5.17.0.1027.25 No subscription required
